entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as the one who had fled, indicating that he was a significant figure in the story. ("his life almost extinguished, Vold emort had fled")

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as having become famous and being known by everyone in the hidden wizarding world. ("Voldemort’s followers had disbanded, and Harry Potter had become famous.")

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is described as having discovered that he was a wizard on his eleventh birthday. ("It had been enough of a shock for Harry to discover, on his eleventh birthday, that he was a wizard;")

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as the place where Harry would be starting his fourth year. ("At the end of this summer, he would be starting his fourth year at Hogwarts,")

relationships.description: Voldemort fled from Harry Potter. ("his life almost extinguished, Vold emort had fled;")
Voldemort's followers disbanded after he was defeated by Harry Potter. ("Voldemort’s followers had disbanded, and Harry Potter had become famous.")

relationships.entity_1: everyone in the hidden wizarding world
relationships.description: Everyone in the hidden wizarding world knew Harry's name. ("it had been even more dis-concerting to find out that everyone in the hidden wizarding world knew his name.")
When Harry arrived at Hogwarts, heads turned and whispers followed him. ("Harry had arrived at  Hogwarts to find that heads turned and whispers followed him wherever he went.")
